The Starry Night - To be able to witness the vastness and beauty of the cosmos, and to experience the feeling of wonder and awe that Vincent Van Gogh captured in his painting.
The Scream - To experience the intense emotions and intensity that Edvard Munch portrayed in his painting, and to understand the impact it has had on modern art.
The Persistence of Memory - To immerse myself in the surreal dreamlike world that Salvador Dali created, and to explore the deeper meaning it holds.
The Thinker - To be the central character in Auguste Rodin's famous sculpture, and to experience the philosophical introspection that the statue invites viewers to ponder.
Guernica - To be a witness to the atrocities and devastating impact of war, as Pablo Picasso did in his anti-war painting.
